invocations.description: Will open a database at your '/data/custom/' folders. This way you can load and save values to this custom database. Custom databases can only be opened from Hotkeys, Persistents, Cavebot, HUDs and Library scripts.
invocations.ex:
local db = opendatabase('necrosyalahar')
local amountkilled = db:getvalue('counters', 'necroskilled')
invocations.exDescription: This will retrieve the value stored in the database '/data/custom/necrosyalahar.db', in the location: 'counters/necroskilled', and save this value to the variable amount killed.
